column1: NGR is from long/lat on 1910s record. Altitudes match. 1950s record has the NGR as SN880210, which is the other side of the reservoir. The record notes the gauge is near the reservoir keepers cottage, which looks to be near the NGR used here. The long/lat for No 2 gauge on the 1910s record matches the NGR on the 1950s record, suggesting the long/lat figures are accurate. MIDAS has a gauge near this NGR with the same dates
